attributes.action: Parliament to follow the Constitution of the  United Kingdom prior to 1972
attributes.additional_details: In bringing this matter to the attention of fellow subjects of the Crown I am under the Queen’s protection for as Fitzherbert wrote (Vide 7 Co. 8, 9, Calvin’s Case ANT 130a, Sect 199) “Every loyal subject is in the Queen’s Protection.”
attributes.background: The governance of the United Kingdom by any other authority than Her Majesty and Parliament is forbidden by our "Unwritten Constitution" that states clearly that such a state of affairs is illegal...

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
